7. tos_SFA_We_are_Outlaw_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : We are Outlaw remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Sevin, Subtantial, Highdore
ㆍLyrics by Sevin, SungHa Hong, Substantial, Highdore
ㆍVocal : Substantial, Highdore
ㆍKeys & Programming : Sevin
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]

It's not the way
It's gotta be fake
It's the last cake
hurry up! turn off the candle Whooh!

We are Outlaw
We are Outlaw
We are keeping the, keeping the law
We are Outlaw


all they know
all they know
all they know
illegal to own

all they know
all they know
but I'm gotta own

all they know
all they know
somebody gotta catch
it's the last cake uh uh oh
hurry up uh uh uh oh
turn off the candle


My homies they were on that, on that! I stepped into the wrong path, wrong path!
Had me thinkin’ if you ain’t first, you’re last. Came too far to turn back, turn back!
You create music? Me too! More bars than a city block, beats too
Word to mama. Money, fame, and honor? Got about as much of that as you do
But you do the one that signed your life away on bogus deals
Chasing lies, closed your eyes, now you don’t know what's real
But I realize, this music life ain’t something that’s ideal
Wanted to blow up but then I just focused on giving you something to feel
Living in this ruthless world, in a roofless car, where Luther’s gone*
When you fighting for check, for a song you own, how can you make a house a home
Met a couple legends. Made a couple classics. Couple people know my name.
Got a little press and love, but tell the truth bruh, that don’t mean a thing
I just want to earn my worth ‘fore these so called “leaders” burn the earth
Do I gotta go pop to burst, trying to put a little something in wifey’s purse
Getting Gucci, Prada doe but your product though, it sounds generic
Sleeping on me like hibernation. Honey, I can hardly bare it
Why’s this nonsense, weighing heavy on my conscious
Maybe I should change the topic, or stop it because it’s toxic
When it’s trending people copy. That’s right! Mommas, cousins and posses
Showing up dumb late to the party. No artistry in their body
But they’re dominating those Billboard charts with everything single thing they release
Meanwhile, I’m making tunes for my fam nonstop so they’re not isolated on the streets
Composing, to me, it’s easy. Not boasting but it’s like breathing
I flow through these genres freely. Can’t box me in or defeat me
But hold up, why is succeeding a challenge and money fleeting
The idea of me completing goals, means living, no more dreaming… whoa!
500GB of beats is on your hard drive?!
That plus 500 songs I wrote, stored upon mine.
But you’re a superstar, chasing fame and supercars
But that won’t last so I work on my craft while I’m studying Mazurkas
So when you pull off in that OFF-WHITE, I’m locked in the studio all night
In a dog fight... to get my name in the history books I can’t settle for a blog site
I’m no tool or chicken sexer, thats slaving so much I miss my blessing
Purpose driven, no time for digressing. Always forward. This is progression! This is the message!
This is my calling. I gotta answer. Make sure my voice cut through all of the banter
Pardon my candor. I am a lantern. Beacon of hope to set a new standard!

8. tos_SFA_Guillotina_Tristeza_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Guillotina Tristeza remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin(Composer)
ㆍArranged by Coca
ㆍLyrics by Sevin, Kazing, SungHa
ㆍVocal : Adriana Figueroa
ㆍKeys & Programming : Coca
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]
Verse))
if i fall down, someone else found me from the deep
sometimes i try not to believe any tales for this
today would be just like that wind they will
stop control us and take me from behind from sorrow

if i wake up, times will tell me the day as soon should be
keep in your eyes to lots of things to do that i can't see
to-day would be just like that wind they will
stop control us and take me from behind of sorrow

Chorus))
several dreams gonna fade out true
colors remain in vain
nothings gonna changed now
All the truth is Scraping away

First time we have been this world
i pray for the moon and the stars
please give me a hand actually
it is more painful than unforgettable missing

Bride))
feel this sun goes down all night all day without me
deep sleep from my lips above take my way lookin inside

End Chorus))
several dreams gonna fade out true
colors remain in vain
nothings gonna changed now
All the truth is Scraping away

First time we have been this world
i pray for the moon and the stars
please give me a hand actually
it is more painful than unforgettable missing

9. tos_SFA_Escarcero_onda_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Escarcero onda remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Coca
ㆍLyrics by Kazing
ㆍVocal : EunYu
ㆍKeys & Programming : Coca
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]
1절)
하얀 밤 노을 자리에
시린 바람결 홀로 깊었던 밤
오래 전 아득한 그날처럼
달빛 아래 길었던 꿈들이 지나네
어떤 별 보다 빛나던
그 계절 속 마법 같았던 시간
스쳐 지났던 바람 사이로
한없이 기리던 수 많은 나날들

Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 노래가
잊혀져간대도 나
기도 할게요
떨리는 이 손 끝이
저 하늘에 닿으면
짙은 어둔 밤 사라져 버린 꿈처럼
서성이던 시간 속에서
숨겨 왔던 작은 별 들을
빛낼 수 있어요

2절)
깊은 밤 달꽃 향기가
새벽녘 바람에 희미해진 때
푸른 하늘과 별 빛 조각들
사라질듯한 꿈 안에 비춰오네

Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 노래가
잊혀져간대도 나
기도 할게요
떨리는 이 손 끝이
저 하늘에 닿으면
짙은 어둔 밤 사라져 버린 꿈처럼
서성이던 시간 속에서
숨겨 왔던 작은 별 들을
빛낼 수 있어요

Bridge)
새하얗게 꽃눈 내리던 날
깊은 밤 하늘 수 놓은 길 위에
그저 희미한 빛으로 남아
달빛 아래 길었던 이야길 들어주오

End Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 목소리가
예전처럼 내 곁에 들려오지 않아도
미어질듯 아파와도
걸어 나가야겠죠
길었던 기다림 끝에서 잊지 않도록
에어질듯 차디찬 바람이 몰아쳐도
더 이상 헤매지 않도록
짙은 밤하늘과
새 하얀 숨결 속에서
아직 차가운 꿈 결 마저도

10. tos_SFA_Dienos_Advento_Hyangyu_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Dienos Advento Hyangyu remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Sevin
ㆍLyrics by Seiyon Kim, Kristyna
ㆍVocal : Hyangyu Lee
ㆍGuitar : Drogo
ㆍKeys & Programming : Sevin
ㆍMixed by S.F.A
ㆍMastered by Sevin(S.F.A)
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.


[Lyrics]
Sugriautą karalystę, sužeistą pamatę Deivę, jūs šventą pyktį neškite savy,
Deivės rankose – galia ir gailestingumas, jūsiškėse – drąsa ir ginklas tinka.

Nuo laiko pradžios iki pasaulio pabaigos Deivės priešai - tai ir mūsų priešai

Laimos akmenyje įrėžtas pažadas – gėlės čianai būtinai žydės.-
ir išpranašauta Deivė į šią žemę
Pas mus vėl ateis Iki tos dienos Elijo kraują saugokim, budėkim.

SB: ledą sudaužyk, tamsą pašalink, tuštumą užpildyk
audros viduryje kary, kur bebūtum su jais kariauki

Net stebuklingame ugnies bokšte, nepasiektoje žinių šventykloje
Jūratės bedugnės šventyklos šešėlyje pergalė švies

Kaip ir išpranašauta, Deivė šioje žemėje sėkminga bus
Iki tos dienos ant tikėjimo akmens tvirtai stovėkim.

7. tos_SFA_We_are_Outlaw_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : We are Outlaw remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Sevin, Subtantial, Highdore
ㆍLyrics by Sevin, SungHa Hong, Substantial, Highdore
ㆍVocal : Substantial, Highdore
ㆍKeys & Programming : Sevin
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]

It's not the way
It's gotta be fake
It's the last cake
hurry up! turn off the candle Whooh!

We are Outlaw
We are Outlaw
We are keeping the, keeping the law
We are Outlaw


all they know
all they know
all they know
illegal to own

all they know
all they know
but I'm gotta own

all they know
all they know
somebody gotta catch
it's the last cake uh uh oh
hurry up uh uh uh oh
turn off the candle


My homies they were on that, on that! I stepped into the wrong path, wrong path!
Had me thinkin’ if you ain’t first, you’re last. Came too far to turn back, turn back!
You create music? Me too! More bars than a city block, beats too
Word to mama. Money, fame, and honor? Got about as much of that as you do
But you do the one that signed your life away on bogus deals
Chasing lies, closed your eyes, now you don’t know what's real
But I realize, this music life ain’t something that’s ideal
Wanted to blow up but then I just focused on giving you something to feel
Living in this ruthless world, in a roofless car, where Luther’s gone*
When you fighting for check, for a song you own, how can you make a house a home
Met a couple legends. Made a couple classics. Couple people know my name.
Got a little press and love, but tell the truth bruh, that don’t mean a thing
I just want to earn my worth ‘fore these so called “leaders” burn the earth
Do I gotta go pop to burst, trying to put a little something in wifey’s purse
Getting Gucci, Prada doe but your product though, it sounds generic
Sleeping on me like hibernation. Honey, I can hardly bare it
Why’s this nonsense, weighing heavy on my conscious
Maybe I should change the topic, or stop it because it’s toxic
When it’s trending people copy. That’s right! Mommas, cousins and posses
Showing up dumb late to the party. No artistry in their body
But they’re dominating those Billboard charts with everything single thing they release
Meanwhile, I’m making tunes for my fam nonstop so they’re not isolated on the streets
Composing, to me, it’s easy. Not boasting but it’s like breathing
I flow through these genres freely. Can’t box me in or defeat me
But hold up, why is succeeding a challenge and money fleeting
The idea of me completing goals, means living, no more dreaming… whoa!
500GB of beats is on your hard drive?!
That plus 500 songs I wrote, stored upon mine.
But you’re a superstar, chasing fame and supercars
But that won’t last so I work on my craft while I’m studying Mazurkas
So when you pull off in that OFF-WHITE, I’m locked in the studio all night
In a dog fight... to get my name in the history books I can’t settle for a blog site
I’m no tool or chicken sexer, thats slaving so much I miss my blessing
Purpose driven, no time for digressing. Always forward. This is progression! This is the message!
This is my calling. I gotta answer. Make sure my voice cut through all of the banter
Pardon my candor. I am a lantern. Beacon of hope to set a new standard!

8. tos_SFA_Guillotina_Tristeza_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Guillotina Tristeza remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin(Composer)
ㆍArranged by Coca
ㆍLyrics by Sevin, Kazing, SungHa
ㆍVocal : Adriana Figueroa
ㆍKeys & Programming : Coca
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]
Verse))
if i fall down, someone else found me from the deep
sometimes i try not to believe any tales for this
today would be just like that wind they will
stop control us and take me from behind from sorrow

if i wake up, times will tell me the day as soon should be
keep in your eyes to lots of things to do that i can't see
to-day would be just like that wind they will
stop control us and take me from behind of sorrow

Chorus))
several dreams gonna fade out true
colors remain in vain
nothings gonna changed now
All the truth is Scraping away

First time we have been this world
i pray for the moon and the stars
please give me a hand actually
it is more painful than unforgettable missing

Bride))
feel this sun goes down all night all day without me
deep sleep from my lips above take my way lookin inside

End Chorus))
several dreams gonna fade out true
colors remain in vain
nothings gonna changed now
All the truth is Scraping away

First time we have been this world
i pray for the moon and the stars
please give me a hand actually
it is more painful than unforgettable missing

9. tos_SFA_Escarcero_onda_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Escarcero onda remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Coca
ㆍLyrics by Kazing
ㆍVocal : EunYu
ㆍKeys & Programming : Coca
ㆍMixed by Park Moon Soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMastered by Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

[Lyrics]
1절)
하얀 밤 노을 자리에
시린 바람결 홀로 깊었던 밤
오래 전 아득한 그날처럼
달빛 아래 길었던 꿈들이 지나네
어떤 별 보다 빛나던
그 계절 속 마법 같았던 시간
스쳐 지났던 바람 사이로
한없이 기리던 수 많은 나날들

Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 노래가
잊혀져간대도 나
기도 할게요
떨리는 이 손 끝이
저 하늘에 닿으면
짙은 어둔 밤 사라져 버린 꿈처럼
서성이던 시간 속에서
숨겨 왔던 작은 별 들을
빛낼 수 있어요

2절)
깊은 밤 달꽃 향기가
새벽녘 바람에 희미해진 때
푸른 하늘과 별 빛 조각들
사라질듯한 꿈 안에 비춰오네

Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 노래가
잊혀져간대도 나
기도 할게요
떨리는 이 손 끝이
저 하늘에 닿으면
짙은 어둔 밤 사라져 버린 꿈처럼
서성이던 시간 속에서
숨겨 왔던 작은 별 들을
빛낼 수 있어요

Bridge)
새하얗게 꽃눈 내리던 날
깊은 밤 하늘 수 놓은 길 위에
그저 희미한 빛으로 남아
달빛 아래 길었던 이야길 들어주오

End Chr)
언제 부턴가
나를 부르던 그 목소리가
예전처럼 내 곁에 들려오지 않아도
미어질듯 아파와도
걸어 나가야겠죠
길었던 기다림 끝에서 잊지 않도록
에어질듯 차디찬 바람이 몰아쳐도
더 이상 헤매지 않도록
짙은 밤하늘과
새 하얀 숨결 속에서
아직 차가운 꿈 결 마저도

10. tos_SFA_Dienos_Advento_Hyangyu_remaster

ㆍTitle : Dienos Advento Hyangyu remaster
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)

[Lyrics]
Sugriautą karalystę, sužeistą pamatę Deivę, jūs šventą pyktį neškite savy,
Deivės rankose – galia ir gailestingumas, jūsiškėse – drąsa ir ginklas tinka.

Nuo laiko pradžios iki pasaulio pabaigos Deivės priešai - tai ir mūsų priešai

Laimos akmenyje įrėžtas pažadas – gėlės čianai būtinai žydės.-
ir išpranašauta Deivė į šią žemę
Pas mus vėl ateis Iki tos dienos Elijo kraują saugokim, budėkim.

SB: ledą sudaužyk, tamsą pašalink, tuštumą užpildyk
audros viduryje kary, kur bebūtum su jais kariauki

Net stebuklingame ugnies bokšte, nepasiektoje žinių šventykloje
Jūratės bedugnės šventyklos šešėlyje pergalė švies

Kaip ir išpranašauta, Deivė šioje žemėje sėkminga bus
Iki tos dienos ant tikėjimo akmens tvirtai stovėkim.
